pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS recommened
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
